attributes.action: Press ahead with the planned vehicle road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have set up this petition to counter those who wish to drive into gridlock if nothing is done to ease congestion now. It will reduce pollution in this country and make the roads safer for children and cyclists. I am not some bearded greeny who hates cars, I own a car myself but prefer to cycle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
